channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData
channel.description: Tweets about open data, which have received at least 10 hearts or retweets, in many languages

item.title: #en @ 1505331359866314753
item.description:
A friend let me know one of my Kaggle datasets showed up in @pbump's "How to Read This Chart" newsletter.
It's always great to learn about how open data is getting used once it's out there in the world. Like getting a postcard from an old friend. 😁

item.title: #nl @ 1505196470017867777
item.description:
@madmaffie Klinkt mooi, willen werken, zodra ze mogen komt er weinig van terecht. 53% vd NL bijstandsuitkeringen gaat naar 14,4% niet-Westerse migranten; 9% gaat naar de 10,9% Westerse migranten. Niet-westerse zéggen te willen werken, Westerse migranten dóén het.
https://t.co/FWjVili6OK

item.title: #en @ 1505189913708601353
item.description:
Postcodes in Polygon: an #opendata tool from @datadaptive. Draw a shape on a map, get a list of postcodes. https://t.co/6qiTuHmfQN (GB only)
Now updated with postcode data from the latest release of the ONS Postcode Directory (February 2022). https://t.co/hAeFKHDapz

item.title: #en @ 1505121120537784320
item.description:

⬇️#Sentinel2 🇪🇺🛰️image of Dakar🇸🇳, one of the cities in sub-Saharan Africa vulnerable to #ClimateChange https://t.co/MoJi5h5wT0

item.title: #es @ 1505114085486116867
item.description:
La descarga de datos es un clic. Sin embargo, la versión oficial de esto mismo requiere de la instalación de un programa Java que viene con un manual PDF de 32 páginas. Y no es que sea viejo: es del año pasado. Cutre y caro.
Esta gente está chalada.
🔗 https://t.co/IvsA9Rv9zV https://t.co/yIhE8z6a9G

item.title: #es @ 1505020461708713996
#es @ 1504989201363832834
item.description:
Un día como hoy de 2 años se confirmaba el primer lamentable deceso por #COVID19 en #México.
Al reporte del 18/03/22, en los datos abiertos de la @SSalud_mx, se han confirmado 321,931 decesos por #COVID19mx.
Así su distribución durante la totalidad de la contingencia en #MEX. https://t.co/AN1AB9gYxE

item.title: #es @ 1504947127855857665
item.description:
🙏DIEZ días consecutivos
Desde el 08 de marzo: CERO pacientes en UCI por #COVID19 en la región Huancavelica
#OjoAlDato La región San Martín reporta sólo UN paciente en UCI desde el 15/03 y la región Pasco sólo DOS desde el 11/03
Fuente: SuSalud vía #DatosAbiertos 🇵🇪

item.title: #es @ 1504947124361904131
item.description:
#LOULTIMO 🇵🇪
Hoy MINSA reportará menos de 1,500 pacientes hospitalizados por #COVID19 a nivel nacional y con cifras similares de mediados de abril del 2020➡️ 1,495
Fuente: #DatosAbiertos SuSalud #LasVacunasNosDanEsperanza https://t.co/vn2dywVvNS

item.title: #es @ 1504947089201147910
item.description:

Fuente: #DatosAbiertos SuSalud #LasVacunasNosDanEsperanza https://t.co/MO8ebVC7T3

item.title: #en @ 1504895802275086336
item.description: @WisdomSeeker123 @Osinttechnical Open data and web client exists: https://t.co/GeNCxphEJk Multiple OS clients too that utilize OSM's dataset. In western Europe it tends to have more data than Google Maps and is updated quicker. I'm not sure how Ukraine compares, but anyone can improve it similar to Wikipedia.

item.title: #en @ 1504894279646339072
item.description: The OpenID Foundation is pleased to share its new whitepaper, “Open Banking, Open Data and Financial-Grade APIs”. The paper documents the international movement towards Open Banking, Open Finance, and secure, consent driven access to all user data. https://t.co/Svc0bplEX9 #FAPI

item.title: #en @ 1504890433360519174
item.description: The staff and board of NativeBio has been aware of the dangers of Open Access, Open Data arguments for some time now. Glad to see this researcher catching up to the conversation and spreading the message among funding agencies and universities. https://t.co/IFoBWxWGJN

item.title: #it @ 1504876544598032386
item.description: È nata #Kohesio, piattaforma open data su oltre 1,5 milioni di progetti finanziati in Europa dalla politica di coesione. Per l'Italia i progetti sono quasi 740mila: la fonte è #OpenCoesione e Kohesio rappresenta un’esperienza di riuso dei dati del portale https://t.co/lAvK4TgieY https://t.co/7EJTm87SH0

item.title: #en @ 1504846977460224034
item.description:
According to our analysis of Open Data, this driver's car was tied for having the FOURTH highest number of red light camera violations in all of NYC last year.
And even after destroying a beloved Brooklyn memorial, there's still been zero consequences. https://t.co/7VIhEq4Emq

item.title: #en @ 1504807503900692482
item.description:
@IEA @MaxCRoser This is just one of many critical arguments for why this energy data should be open.
We outlined the rest – climate change; energy inequalities globally; scientific transparency – in our article here: https://t.co/jYMKX01GjR

item.title: #en @ 1504804711119134730
item.description:
Next week the @IEA will hold its 2022 ministerial meeting.
Countries have the option to make global energy data free & open for everyone. It's even more important now.
@MaxCRoser & I explain why, with a new section on energy security👇
https://t.co/jYMKX01GjR https://t.co/uPSzG94hB8

item.title: #es @ 1504777738443440131
item.description:
➡️VP @NadiaCalvino: Estamos poniendo en marcha proyectos legislativos para desarrollar un mercado único de datos en UE que dé #confianza, para que los datos estén en un espacio seguro.
Avanzamos hacia la creación de un repositorio de datos abiertos con una perspectiva humanista. https://t.co/OtDMip0UUu

item.title: #en @ 1504654604079820800
item.description:
I don't like the assertion against open data that "such data should only be accessed by those with credentials".
That asserts that the public doesn't have academics, scientists, & professionals to contextualize open data.
That is asserting that the public is dumb.

item.title: #en @ 1504602809068576786
item.description:
Starting to think it might be worth naming and shaming some of these given how often I'm coming across it right now.
Website title: "Open Data Portal" Terms: "...you will not share or sell the data with any third party [...] or use the data for any other purpose"
🤨 https://t.co/PksmETlZYd

item.title: #en @ 1504596228088414208
item.description: Contributing to Indigenous genomics efforts for rare disease diagnosis has been the most humbling work in my open data career. Reference data is critical for equity in diagnosis, but ownership and control must remain in Indigenous hands. Trust must be earned. Over generations. https://t.co/mDE2X9HBMp

item.description: 16/ Utilizando los propios datos abiertos puestos a disposición del público por el SESNSP entre Enero de 2019 y Enero de 2020 se observa una reducción de 62% (135 vs 51) en la suma de estas dos tipologías de delito.

item.title: #es @ 1504483526879506438
item.description:

item.title: #fr @ 1504481894074761225
item.description: D'ailleurs, il y a des mesures pour favoriser l'open data dans le programme de Mélenchon pour ceux que ça intéresse. C'est un enjeu important parmi tant d'autres.

item.title: #fr @ 1504481078731440140
item.description: Macron qui planquait les avis du conseil scientifique lorsqu'ils n'allaient pas dans le sens de sa politique veut maintenant ouvrir beaucoup plus les données publiques pour plus de transparence. Les promesses n'engagent que les cons qui y croient...

item.title: #fr @ 1504470835993538562
item.description: « Missiles, avions, roquettes, torpilles, bombes... Ces pays, dont la France, ont exporté pour 346millions d’euros d’équipement militaire, selon des données publiques. Certaines de ces armes pourraient se trouver sur le front ukrainien en ce moment même. » https://t.co/1dqjIJNOIB

item.title: #en @ 1504465477401255938
item.description:
NYC Open Data released SAT scores by school from 2012 -- 10 yrs later! With COVID grading and now lottery replacing Screened HS admissions, what will this look like for 2022. @DOEChancellor
No surprise that 6 of top 10 Math SAT are from #SHSAT high schools. https://t.co/uU0Lqv0Tom

item.title: #en @ 1504451008419794952
item.description: As part of its open source software strategy, the European Commission declared its decision to prioritize open and free software. For this, it uses @WikimediaDE 's free, open software Wikibase. More info: https://t.co/pLolAim50u @EUinmyregion #Opendata #CohesionForum

item.title: #fr @ 1504416188079562761
item.description:
Le Y-20 immatriculé 11150, du 12ème régiment de l'armée de l'air chinoise, semble être en Afrique actuellement.
Les données publiques montrent que l'appareil est parti de Djibouti pour la Zambie le 16 Mars dans la matinée. Distance environ 3300 km. https://t.co/gq7lm5wM65

item.title: #de @ 1504410092044787719
item.description: Urheberrecht ist nicht immer intuitiv: @simonschlauri erklärt in der heutigen #OpenData @researchdigisus @unibern, warum Datenbanken in der Schweiz grundsätzlich nicht geschützt sind. Und er gibt Einführung in @creativecommons Lizenzen und wie diese mit #OpenData zusammenhängen. https://t.co/FuZcUwztq1

item.title: #en @ 1504397134161977349
item.description:
#OnThisDay 1917
The 127m Passenger Ship Antony was torpedoed twice by U-boat U-48 and now lies at 67m below the surface, 14km SW of Hook head.
Check out our #Shipwreck Viewer ➜ https://t.co/wz5QxER5lS
#Submarineday #SeabedMapping #OpenData
@Dept_ECC @GeolSurvIE @MarineInst https://t.co/bCddbxIYnb
